name: Laser Blast! 4: The Lunasol Encounter
description:
Laser Blast! 4: The Lunasol Encounter

Developed by: Elias Mote

(c) Roc Studios 2022

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Made with Pico-8

Description: This sci-fi themed platformer is the fourth in the Laser Blast! jam series. Play as the advanced robot Atom Girl and progress through a platforming level, defeating enemy forces along the way. Destroy the end boss to complete Atom Girl's mission and help save her planet from evil invading forces.

Controls:

Left and right keys - Move left and right, respectively

Up key - Jump or perform a midair hover. If you hold jump after jumping, hovering will be performed at about the apex of the first jump

'Z' key - Dash along the ground. If you are dashing when you jump, you'll travel farther. Also progresses through the menu screens.

'X' key - Shoot a small energy ball. Holding the key down will charge Atom Girl's weapon. Release to shoot a level 2 or 3 shot, based on charge time.

Tips:

  • You have some temporary invincibility after taking a hit. Use it to your advantage! 
  • Enemy collisions deal more damage than enemy projectiles.
  • A level 1 charge shot hurts enemies for 1 damage, while level 2 is 2 damage and level 3 is 3 damage.
  • If a level  3 shot kills an enemy, it will pierce the enemy and keep going. Level 1 and 2 shots never pierce.
  • The boss at the end of the level speeds its attacks up substantially after losing half its life. Be careful! It will tend to roll more dangerous attacks once its health is low.
  • Enemies killed have a 33% chance to drop a heart that heals for 2 pips of health.
  • Most enemies cannot turn around.
  • There is a checkpoint once you get to the boss.
